tweet.title: #artstudio Friday went rather well, so a treat for self; half an hour splitting #sedums and planting #tulips. #lovespring
A few of my pieces at the @AAF this weekend, @rostragallery here's hoping for a fantastic few days!
todays purchase- a #daylightbulb. Finally I can see in colour (new studio faces south)
wonderful weekend with walks in the daffodils. Jug of #blackthorn blossom in my Judith Rowe jug.
sketching the #Reedbuntings piling into the frosty garden this morning.
Loving your cards and hoping to submit a few designs @GreenPebble1. Could I grab an email?
#Garden full of promise. Studio full of hellebores. Need an hour of daylight without a small person crying or weeing.
we have a beautiful yellow #crabapple tree to plant in honour of my son's first birthday alongside all the dancing #primroses
perfect day gardening, dancing, and buying purple sprouting broccoli #bathfarmersmarket
garden centre this morning- stocking up on a few winter-y delights. Café proved teeny bit more inspiring #coffeeintherain
so, #joinedtwitter tick. #madeanetsyshop tick. #glassofwine BIG TICK. https://t.co/RTCzxEmiod
chimney leak in the studio fixed by some nimble builders dancing on the roof today. Love builders. Love lead flashing. Love my studio.
